;;;66         uint32_t ret;
;;;67     
;;;68         switch(CRC->CTL & CRC_CTL_CRCMODE_Msk)

000004  f0004040          AND      r0,r0,#0xc0000000
000008  f1b04f00          CMP      r0,#0x80000000
00000c  d008              BEQ      |L1.32|
00000e  f1b04f40          CMP      r0,#0xc0000000
000012  d008              BEQ      |L1.38|
000014  b120              CBZ      r0,|L1.32|
000016  f1b04f80          CMP      r0,#0x40000000
00001a  d006              BEQ      |L1.42|
;;;69         {
;;;70         case CRC_CCITT:
;;;71         case CRC_16:
;;;72             ret = (CRC->CHECKSUM & 0xFFFFU);
;;;73             break;
;;;74         case CRC_32:
;;;75             ret = (CRC->CHECKSUM);
;;;76             break;
;;;77         case CRC_8:
;;;78             ret = (CRC->CHECKSUM & 0xFFU);
;;;79             break;
;;;80         default:
;;;81             ret = 0U;
00001c  2000              MOVS     r0,#0
;;;82             break;
;;;83         }
;;;84     
;;;85         return ret;
;;;86     }

;;;47     {
;;;48         CRC->SEED = u32Seed;
000002  4c06              LDR      r4,|L2.28|

00000a  f0400001          ORR      r0,r0,#1

;;;50     
;;;51         /* Setting CHKSINIT bit will reload the initial seed value(CRC_SEED register) to CRC controller */
;;;52         CRC->CTL |= CRC_CTL_CHKSINIT_Msk;
